creator: fabrice_fourel@yahoo.fr
text:
We have an apache server 2.2.3.0 on a windows 2003 server and it causes many
failures every 10 minutes.
"Application Failure  httpd.exe 2.2.3.0 in msvcrt.dll 7.0.3790.1830 at offset
00026f9c"
I can't find a solution to stop this and we should restart many times in a day.
It' too bad for a production system.
